short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and Summarize Website Content Effortlessly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save and Summarize Website Content Effortlessly

The Short Notes extension allows users to quickly capture, organize, and summarize content from websites. By selecting text on any webpage, users can instantly create notes or summarize the content using AI, storing everything in an easy-to-access popup interface.
